name: Halloween Night!
description:
It's Halloween again and it's time to get your magic broom and have a relaxing flying time in this beautiful night! Mess around with the scene and pumpkins! 🎃👻🌖🔥

Click and drag this little witch to fly! You can also click and drag pumpkins and trees!!

Have fun!

Sound: https://freesound.org/people/Martykrz/sounds/540927/ | freesound.org
